import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { UserService } from '../services/user.service'; import { User } from '../models/user'; @Component({ selector: 'app-users', templateUrl: './users.component.html', styleUrls: ['./users.component.css'] }) export class UsersComponent { users: User[]; constructor(private userService: UserService){}; ngOnInit(){ this.userService.GetUsers().subscribe(res=>{ this.users=res; }); } }
